General.Name: Djasa Ubersakti Tbk
General.Description: PT Djasa Ubersakti Tbk engages in the construction business in Indonesia. The company operates in Construction Services and Sales Of Landed House segments. It constructs residential, office, industrial, shopping, health, education, electrical, and lodging buildings, as well as other miscellaneous building; sports and entertainment venues; and bridges and flyovers, bridges and overpasses, airplane runways, irrigation networks, and railroads and rail bridges. The company also engages in the construction of processing, distribution and storage for drinking water, wastewater, and drainage systems; telecommunication facilities; air navigation telecommunication; railway signaling and telecommunication buildings; telecommunication centers; water resources infrastructures; non-fisheries port buildings; and oil and gas processing and storage buildings. In addition, it is also involved in electrical, plumbing, and air conditioning and ventilation installation activities; wholesale of office and industrial machinery, spare parts and their equipment, metal for construction materials, and various kinds of building materials and goods; real estate owning or leasing business; and mining and other supporting activities. PT Djasa Ubersakti Tbk was founded in 1971 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Bona Indah Plaza Blok A2/B8, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12440
